title: Robots of Mars - The Jewel of Power: Part 3
description: The continuation of Sparkyâ€™s adventures on Mars, this time on a mission to retrieve the Martian Jewel of Power from the evil Supervisor of Mars. On the way to finding the jewel, Sparky and his pals are confronted by a series of obstacles before they reach their destination at the Martian ruins. Will Sparky survive these dangerous obstacles? Find out!
author: Don  Fox
